entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is mentioned as someone who is supposed to make a new wand for Harry. He is tied up and unable to do so.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who needs a new wand and is trying to figure out why Gregorovitch is tied up.

relationships.description: Gregorovitch is supposed to make a new wand for Harry, but he is unable to do so because he is tied up.
